text: Ese umwe muri mwe yakwifuza kugira umurima w’itende n’imizabibu utembamo imigezi, akawugiramo n’imbuto z’amoko yose, maze yagera mu zabukuru anafite abana b’abanyantege nke (ntacyo bakwimarira), nuko ugaterwa n’inkubi y’umuyaga irimo umuriro mwinshi, maze ugakongoka? (Uru ni rwo rugero rw’abatanga imitungo yabo batagamije kwishimirwa na Allah, bazabura ibihembo ku munsi w’imperuka mu gihe bari babikeneye.) Uko ni ko Allah abereka ibimenyetso (by’ibibafitiye umumaro kugira ngo mumuharire ibikorwa byanyu no) kugira ngo mutekereze
